tool_description: Identifies promotional pricing, discounts, and special offers by analyzing price patterns and promotional indicators.

promotion_indicators.description: Text indicators of promotions: sale, discount, clearance, special

discount_threshold.description: Minimum discount percentage to flag as promotion

lookback_days.description: Days to look back for baseline price comparison

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 7 days of price history for promotion detection.
Invalid discount threshold: Threshold must be between 1.0 and 99.0 percent.
Invalid lookback period: Lookback days must be between 7 and 365.
Missing price history: Cannot detect promotions without baseline price data.
usage: Submit current and historical price data with promotion detection parameters. Returns identified promotions and discount levels.

promotions_detected.description: Products currently on promotion with discount details

average_discount.description: Average discount percentage across all promotions
